name: The Noon Invasion
description:
The Noon Invasion plays just like your typical arcade shooter game. However, every object in it sings along the music! Enemies, lasers, even score! An entirely procedurally generated song, made by both the game system and your inputs. Try your best to beat your high score, or just enjoy the music.

Warning: It seems that some sounds don't load properly on the first launch? If the game is suspiciously silent (like not making note when you're shooting), try to reload the page.

Controls
  • Left/Right: Move
  • Up: Shoot
  • Down: Shoot on side
  • Enter: Start game
Mentions

Made for the Video Games Lab Jam 2021, with theme “Arcade”. I guess you've already noticed the Space Invaders inspiration!

Made with Phaser-JS, Tone-JS and Orchestre-JS.

  • Font: Uroob
  • midierror's Deluxe Chipshop
  • FSFT Electric Guitar Clean from FreePats
